law.catch_line: Distribution In Course Of Business In Violation Of Sec. 16 Or Furnishing False Information In Application, Etc., Prohibited

text.section: distribute a controlled substance classified in Schedule I or II in the course of his legitimate business, except pursuant to an order or an order form as required by section sixteen; or

furnish false or fraudulent material information in, or omit any material information from, any application, report, record, or other document required to be made, kept, or filed pursuant to the provisions of this chapter.
